description: This file defines a React functional component called Pagination which provides pagination controls with previous/next buttons, showing current page info, and handling state for page navigation.

methods.name: Pagination({ page, total, pageSize, onPage })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders pagination controls including previous and next buttons, displaying the current page and total pages.

ctags.name: Pagination
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Pagination({ page, total, pageSize, onPage }) {$/
